column1: ("machine learning"[MeSH Terms] OR "machine learning"[Title/Abstract] OR "neural networks"[MeSH Terms] OR "neural networks"[Title/Abstract] OR "support vector machine"[MeSH Terms] OR "support vector machine"[Title/Abstract] OR "random forest"[Title/Abstract] OR "xgboost"[Title/Abstract]) AND ("Hypertension"[MeSH Terms] OR "Hypertension"[Title/Abstract] OR "High Blood Pressure"[Title/Abstract]) AND ( "Diabetic Patients"[Title/Abstract]) AND ("Hypertension"[MeSH Terms] OR "Hypertension"[Title/Abstract] OR "High Blood Pressure"[Title/Abstract]) AND ("Prediction"[Title/Abstract] OR "Predictive Model"[Title/Abstract] OR "Risk Prediction"[Title/Abstract])
